allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -p1234 articulacion -e "SELECT rol, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM usuarios GROUP BY rol;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion -e "SELECT rol, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM usuarios GROUP BY rol;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT rol, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM usuarios GROUP BY rol;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_grupos FROM grupos WHERE activo=1;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT g.id, g.nombre, p.nombre as programa, g.activo FROM grupos g LEFT JOIN programas p ON g.programa_id = p.id ORDER BY g.id DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT id, nombre, activo FROM programas ORDER BY id;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT c.id, c.nombre, c.activo, u1.documento as doc_docente, u2.documento as doc_rector FROM colegios c LEFT JOIN usuarios u1 ON c.docente_enlace_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN usuarios u2 ON c.rector_id = u2.id WHERE c.activo=1;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT a.id, u.documento, u.nombre, u.apellido, a.colegio_id, a.programa_id, a.grupo_id FROM aprendices a JOIN usuarios u ON a.usuario_id = u.id ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT a.id, u.documento, a.colegio_id, a.programa_id, a.grupo_id FROM aprendices a JOIN usuarios u ON a.usuario_id = u.id ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT u.id, u.documento, u.rol FROM usuarios u WHERE u.rol=''ADMINISTRADOR'' LIMIT 1;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT u.id, u.documento, u.rol FROM usuarios u WHERE u.rol=''DOCENTE'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT u.id, u.documento, u.rol FROM usuarios u WHERE u.rol=''APRENDIZ'' LIMIT 3;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root articulacion_sena -e "SELECT ''Aprendices sin usuario'' as issue, COUNT(*) as cantidad FROM aprendices a LEFT JOIN usuarios u ON a.usuario_id = u.id WHERE u.id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ''Aprendices sin colegio'', COUNT(*) FROM aprendices WHERE colegio_id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ''Grupos sin programa'', COUNT(*) FROM grupos WHERE programa_id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ''Grupos sin colegio'', COUNT(*) FROM grupos WHERE colegio_id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ''Matriculas sin aprendiz'', COUNT(*) FROM matriculas m LEFT JOIN aprendices a ON m.aprendiz_id = a.id WHERE a.id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ''Documentos sin matricula'', COUNT(*) FROM documentos d LEFT JOIN matriculas m ON d.matricula_id = m.id WHERE m.id IS NULL;")
